bgameb.dices module

Classes taht implements game dices and coins

_summary_

colors: Set[str]
flip_coin()[source]
class bgameb.dices.Dice(name: str = 'default_dice')[source]

Bases: DataClassJsonMixin

Base class to create the dice

Define name to identify later Dice object by unique name. For example: ‘six_side_dice’

Colors is a list of unique colors that can be used for separate dices by colors if you roll ,many in dice tower. You can implenemt it with pythonic set API.

Example of colors usage
    dice = Dice(name='six_side_dice')
    dice.colors.update(['red', 'green'])
    dice.add('white')
colors: Set[str]
name: str = 'default_dice'
roll() → int[source]

Return result of roll

Raises

DiceWithoutSidesError – is not defined number of sides

Returns

result of roll

Return type

int

sides: Optional[int] = None

class bgameb.dices.TrueDice(name: str = 'default_dice', sides: int = 6)[source]

Bases: Dice

Class to create true dices with sides

With sides you can define number of sides for dice. Default 6

sides: int = 6
